revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TD-W9980 |revision=(UN) v1.0 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |fcc_date=07/31/2014 |fcc_id=TE7TDW9980V1 |ic_id=8853A-W9980 |pcb_id=2011500132 |type=wireless router, dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 80910;XWAY VRX268; |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, internal,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip1_model=PSB 8221 |wi1_chip2_brand=Lantiq |wi1_chip2_model=PSB 8301;XWAY WAVE300, (PSB 8301 V V1.1); |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9287 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=none |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Lantiq |eth_chip2_model=PEF 7071V |eth_chip3_brand=Lantiq |eth_chip3_model=PEF 7071V |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |802dot11_protocols=abgn |addl_chips=xDSL (ADSL2+) LD/AFE;Lantiq;PSB 80190;PSB 80190 V, V1.1;1; |flags=ADSL2+, VDSL2, |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32.32; |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|N600 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit VDSL2 Modem Router}} "2011500132", "Rev:1.0" and ''TP-LINK'' logo is silkscreened on the board. It may be fairly similar to the [[TP-LINK TD-W8980 v1]] (Wave300 + AR9287). :Serial connection parameters: 115200 / 8N1 *[http://www.kitz.co.uk/routers/tplink_TD-W9980_review.htm ''TP-Link TD-W9980'' Review] *[https://wiki.kitz.co.uk/index.php/TPLink_TD-W9980 ''TP-Link TD-W9980'' Wiki] === Technical Specifications === {| class="wikitable" width="60%" !colspan="2"|Hardware Features |- |style=" width:150px;"| Interface | 4x 10/100/1000Mbps (RJ45) Ports
1x RJ11 Port, 2x USB 2.0 Ports |- | Button |1x Power On/Off Button, 1x WPS Button
1x Wi-Fi On/Off Switch, 1x RESET Button |- |Standards |802.3, 802.3u, 802.3ab |- |ADSL Standards |Full-rate ANSI T1.413 Issue 2, ITU-T G.995.1
ITU-T G.994.1 (G.hs), ITU-T G.992.1(G.DMT) |- |ADSL2 Standards |ITU-T G.992.3 (G.dmt.bis) |- |ADSL2+ Standards |ITU-T G.992.5 |- |VDSL2 Standards |ITU-T G.993.2 |- |External Power Supply |12VDC/1.5A |- |Dimensions
(W x D x H) |9.6*6.4*1.3 in.
(243 x 160.6 x 32.5 mm) |} {| class="wikitable" width="60%" !colspan="2"|Wireless Features |- |style=" width:150px;"|Wireless Standards |802.11a,802.11b, 802.11g, 802.11n |- |Frequency |2.4GHz and 5GHz |- |Wireless Security |Support 64/128 bit WEP, WPA /WPA2,
WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK, Wireless MAC Filtering |- |Antenna Type |Two 2.4GHz 3.5dBi internal antennas
Three 5GHz 5dBi detachable antennas (RP-SMA) |- |EIRP |< 20dBm(EIRP) |} {| class="wikitable" width="60%" !colspan="2"|Software Features |- |style=" width:150px;"|Quality of Service |WMM, Bandwidth Control (IP QoS) |- |Port Forwarding |Virtual server, Port Triggering, UPnP, DMZ, Manage Control |- |VPN Pass-Through |PPTP, L2TP, IPSec Pass-through |- |ATM/PPP Protocols |ATM Forum UNI3.1/4.0, PPP over ATM (RFC 2364)
PPP over Ethernet (RFC 2516), IPoA (RFC1577/2225)
PVC - Up to 8 PVCs |- |Advanced Features |Parent Control
Traffic Shaping (ATM QoS) UBR, CBR, VBR-rt, VBR-nrt;
Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP), DHCP relay;
Network Address Translation (NAT); PVC/Ethernet Port Grouping
Static Routing, RIP v1/v2 (optional); DNS Relay, DDNS |- |Security |NAT Firewall, SPI Firewall, MAC / IP / URL Filtering |- |USB Sharing |Storage Sharing, FTP Server, Media Server, Print Server |- |Management |Web Based Configuration (HTTP),
Remote management, Telnet management,
Command Line Interface, SSL for TR-069,
SNMP V1/V2C, Web Based Firmware Upgrade,
CWMP(TR-069), Diagnostic Tools |- |IGMP |IGMP snooping V1/V2/V3, IGMP Multicast |- |IPSec VPN |10 IPSec VPN Tunnels, LAN-to-LAN
Main, Aggressive Negotiation Mode
DES, 3DES, AES128, AES192, AES256 Encryption Algorithm
MD5, SHA1 Authentication Algorithm
Manual, IKE Key Management Mode
Dead Peer Detection (DPD), Perfect Forward Secrecy (PFS) |- |IPv6 |IPv6 and IPv4 dual stack
Supported IPv6 Tunnels: DS-Lite, 6RD, 6 to 4
Supported IPv6 Connection Type: PPPoEv6, DHCPv6, Static IPv6 |} __NOTOC__
